title: CERTIFICAGE
description: This project helps you to save all your certificates in the cloud, also you have the option to generate a sharing link.

title: ZenPlet
description: ZenPlet helps to have your pet information in one site, also provides an option to find your pet in case of lost.

title: DON'T FORGET ME
description: A mobile app that helps you to remeber your things when you're leaving, sending you a notification in your custom schedule.

title: CENTERAVID
description: Landing page for CENTERAVID, a drugs an alcohol rehabilitation center in Ecuador, showing its information and images of the clinic.

title: GACU
description: This project was created to promote the turism in Cuenca, Ecuador, using images and trivias.
